sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Card, Icon, Image, Container, Header, Grid, Button, Radio, Form, Divider } from 'semantic-ui-react';

// props: list of selected items as
// {[Item: mainItem, Add-ons: [addItem1, addItem2], ...]}
// Each Item object has Item.price field
class OrderPage extends React.Component {

  state = {
    payment: null
  }

  totalCost = () => {
    // calculate total cost
    return '$5.00';
  }

  selectPayment = (e, { label }) => {
    this.setState({ payment: label});
  }

  render() {

    return (

      <Container>
        <Card fluid>
          <Card.Content>
            <Header as='h3' color='black'>1. ORDER</Header>
            <Grid>
              <Grid.Row>
                {/*for each item in list*/}
                <Grid.Column>
                  <Header as='h3' color='grey'>{/*mainItem*/}Latte</Header>
                </Grid.Column>
                <Grid.Column>
                  <Header as='h3' color='grey'>{/*price*/}$3.50</Header>
                </Grid.Column>
              </Grid.Row>
              {/* for each addon per item*/}
              <Grid.Row>
                <Grid.Column>
                  <Header as='h3' color='grey'>{/*addon*/}Vanilla Syrup</Header>
                </Grid.Column>
                <Grid.Column>
                  <Header as='h3' color='grey'>{/*price*/}$0.50</Header>
                </Grid.Column>
              </Grid.Row>
              <Grid.Row>
                <Divider />
                <Grid.Column>
                  <Header as='h3' color='black'>Total</Header>
                </Grid.Column>
                <Grid.Column>
                  <Header as='h3' color='black'>{this.totalCost()}</Header>
                </Grid.Column>
              </Grid.Row>
            </Grid>
          </Card.Content>
          <Card.Content>
            <Header as='h3' color='black'>2. PAYMENT</Header>
            <Grid>
              <Grid.Row>
                <Grid.Column width='5'>
                  <Form>
                    <Form.Field>
                      <Radio
                        label='Student Charge'
                        name='payment'
                        checked={this.state.payment === 'Student Charge'}
                        onChange={this.selectPayment}
                      />
                    </Form.Field>
                    <Form.Field>
                      <Radio
                        label='Pay at Store'
                        name='payment'
                        checked={this.state.payment === 'Pay at Store'}
                        onChange={this.selectPayment}
                      />
                    </Form.Field>
                  </Form>
                </Grid.Column>
              </Grid.Row>
              <Grid.Row>
                <Grid.Column width='5'>
                </Grid.Column>
                <Grid.Column width='6' textAlign='left'>
                  <Header as='h3'>ADD-ONS</Header>
                  <Form>
                    <Form.Field>
                      <Checkbox
                        label='Vanilla'
                        value='Vanilla'
                      />
                    </Form.Field>
                    <Form.Field>
                      <Checkbox
                        label='Caramel'
                        value='Caramel'
                      />
                    </Form.Field>
                  </Form>
                </Grid.Column>
                <Grid.Column width='5'>
                </Grid.Column>
              </Grid.Row>
            </Grid>
          </Card.Content>
          <Card.Content>
            <Grid padded>
              <Grid.Row>
                <Grid.Column width='5'>
                </Grid.Column>
                <Grid.Column width='3' textAlign='left' verticalAlign='middle'>
                  <Header as='h3' color='grey'>$5.00</Header>
                </Grid.Column>
                <Grid.Column width='3' textAlign='center' verticalAlign='middle'>
                  <Button>
                    ADD ITEM
                  </Button>
                </Grid.Column>
                <Grid.Column width='5'>
                </Grid.Column>
              </Grid.Row>
            </Grid>
          </Card.Content>
        </Card>
      </Container>
    );
  }
}

export default ItemPopUp;
